New Records: De'Aaron Fox set a franchise record with 109 points in back-to-back games
De'Aaron Fox scored 60 points in a single game against the Timberwolves, despite a challenging defensive matchup
Key Match Events: De'Aaron Fox nearly won the game against the Timberwolves from a 20-point deficit
De'Aaron Fox led the Kings to victory against the Jazz despite a missing sixth man and other key players
Post-Match Reflections: De'Aaron Fox's performance was praised as crucial for the Kings' win against the Jazz
De'Aaron Fox's leadership and effort were highlighted despite fatigue from the previous game
Miscellaneous Highlights: De'Aaron Fox's potential for a super max extension and its impact on the Kings' roster management were discussed
